items.name: location-autocomplete
items.title: Location Autocomplete
items.description: Generic location autocomplete component for searching places and addresses. Accepts any provider via the fetchSuggestions prop. Supports client-side or server-side fetches.

items.name: openstreetmap-provider
items.title: OpenStreetMap Provider
items.description: Fetches place suggestions from OpenStreetMap Nominatim API. Returns results with display name, place ID, and raw API data. No API key is required.

items.name: mapbox-provider
items.title: Mapbox Provider
items.description: Fetches location suggestions from Mapbox Geocoding API. Requires a Mapbox API key. Returns results with coordinates, place name, and full API response.

items.name: google-provider
items.title: Google Maps Provider
items.description: Fetches place autocomplete suggestions using Google Places API. Requires a Google API key. Returns structured place information including formatted address and place ID.

items.name: here-provider
items.title: HERE Maps Provider
items.description: Fetches location suggestions using HERE Geocoding & Search API. Requires a HERE API key. Returns results with address, coordinates, and confidence score.

items.name: geoapify-provider
items.title: Geoapify Provider
items.description: Fetches location suggestions from Geoapify Places API. Requires a Geoapify API key. Provides detailed location data including city, country, and coordinates.

items.name: locationiq-provider
items.title: LocationIQ Provider
items.description: Fetches location suggestions from LocationIQ API. Requires a LocationIQ API key. Returns place information with coordinates, display name, and structured address.

items.name: opencage-provider
items.title: OpenCage Provider
items.description: Fetches location suggestions from OpenCage Geocoder API. Requires an OpenCage API key. Returns geocoding results with formatted address, coordinates, and components.

items.name: tomtom-provider
items.title: TomTom Provider
items.description: Fetches location suggestions from TomTom Search API. Requires a TomTom API key. Returns results with full address, position coordinates, and bounding box.
